00172 inline bool ParticleFlowObject::SortByEnergy(const ParticleFlowObject *const pLhs, const ParticleFlowObject *const pRhs)
00173 {
00174     return (pLhs->GetEnergy() > pRhs->GetEnergy());
00175 }
